languages.text: Так прервалась жизнь монастыря Ордена Молота и насельников его. Учинив рать великую и татьбу беспощадную, Вольный Торговец собрал{mf||а} жатву нечестивую и отбыл{mf||а} с Фолстоуна, не оборачиваясь более.

traits.locale_text: Так прервалась жизнь монастыря Ордена Молота и насельников его. Учинив рать великую и татьбу беспощадную, Вольный Торговец собрал{mf||а} жатву нечестивую и отбыла с Фоулстоуна, не оборачиваясь более.

languages.text: So was changed forevermore the life of the monastery of the Order of the Hammer and its brethren. Having waged a great battle and plundered mercilessly, the Rogue Trader claimed {mf|his|her} wicked harvest and departed Foulstone, with nary a backward look.
languages.original_text: Так прервалась жизнь монастыря Ордена Молота и насельников его. Учинив рать великую и татьбу беспощадную, Вольный Торговец собрал{mf||а} жатву нечестивую и отбыл{mf||а} с Фолстоуна, не оборачиваясь более.

traits.locale_text: So was changed forevermore the life of the monastery of the Order of the Hammer and its brethren. Having waged a great battle and plundered mercilessly, the Rogue Trader claimed {mf|his|her} wicked harvest and departed Foulstone, with nary a backward look.

So was changed forevermore the life of the monastery of the Order of the Hammer and its brethren. Having waged a great battle and plundered mercilessly, the Rogue Trader claimed {mf|his|her} wicked harvest and departed Foulstone, with nary a backward look.

So was changed forevermore the life of the monastery of the Order of the Hammer and its brethren. Having waged a great battle and plundered mercilessly, the Rogue Trader claimed {mf|his|her} wicked harvest and departed Foulstone, with nary a backward look.

So was changed forevermore the life of the monastery of the Order of the Hammer and its brethren. Having waged a great battle and plundered mercilessly, the Rogue Trader claimed {mf|his|her} wicked harvest and departed Foulstone, with nary a backward look.

languages.text: 于是，重锤修会教士们的命运被彻底改变。经过一番大肆杀戮与无情掠夺之后，行商浪人带走了{mf|他|她}沾满了鲜血的战利品，离开了荒寂岩地，甚至都没有回头再看一眼。
languages.original_text: So was changed forevermore the life of the monastery of the Order of the Hammer and its brethren. Having waged a great battle and plundered mercilessly, the Rogue Trader claimed {mf|his|her} wicked harvest and departed Foulstone, with nary a backward look.

traits.locale_text: 于是，圣锤修会教士们的命运被彻底改变。经过一番大肆杀戮与无情掠夺之后，行商浪人带走了{mf|他|她}沾满了鲜血的战利品，离开了荒寂岩地，甚至都没有回头再看一眼。

languages.text: Y así fue cómo la vida del monasterio de la Orden del Martillo y sus hermanos cambió para siempre. Tras una gran batalla y un saqueo despiadado, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente recogió su maligno botín y abandonó Rocainmunda sin mirar atrás.
languages.original_text: So was changed forevermore the life of the monastery of the Order of the Hammer and its brethren. Having waged a great battle and plundered mercilessly, the Rogue Trader claimed {mf|his|her} wicked harvest and departed Foulstone, with nary a backward look.

traits.locale_text: Y así fue cómo la vida del monasterio de la Orden del Martillo y sus hermanos cambió para siempre. Tras una gran batalla y un saqueo despiadado, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente recogió su maligno botín y abandonó Rocainmunda sin mirar atrás.

languages.text: そうして、鉄槌の修道会の修道院とその修道士達の生活は、すっかり変わってしまった。激しい戦いを繰り広げて、容赦なく略奪を行った自由開拓者は、その邪悪な収穫物を手中に収め、一度も振り向くことなくファウルストーンを去った。
languages.original_text: So was changed forevermore the life of the monastery of the Order of the Hammer and its brethren. Having waged a great battle and plundered mercilessly, the Rogue Trader claimed {mf|his|her} wicked harvest and departed Foulstone, with nary a backward look.

traits.locale_text: そうして、鉄槌の修道会の修道院とその修道士達の生活は、すっかり変わってしまった。激しい戦いを繰り広げて、容赦なく略奪を行った自由開拓者は、その邪悪な収穫物を手中に収め、一度も振り向くことなくファウルストーンを去った。

languages.text: Und so veränderte sich für immer das Leben der Brüder im Kloster des Ordens des Hammers. Nach einer großen Schlacht und gnadenloser Plünderung beanspruchte {mf|der Freihändler seine|die Freihändlerin ihre} blutige Ernte und verließ Foulstone ohne Blick zurück.
languages.original_text: So was changed forevermore the life of the monastery of the Order of the Hammer and its brethren. Having waged a great battle and plundered mercilessly, the Rogue Trader claimed {mf|his|her} wicked harvest and departed Foulstone, with nary a backward look.

traits.locale_text: Und so veränderte sich für immer das Leben der Brüder im Kloster des Ordens des Hammers. Nach einer großen Schlacht und gnadenloser Plünderung beanspruchte {mf|der Freihändler seine|die Freihändlerin ihre} blutige Ernte und verließ Foulstone ohne Blick zurück.

languages.text: Ainsi sont à jamais transformés le monastère de l'Ordre du Marteau et ses disciples. Sans un regard en arrière, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} quitte Rochepeste après y avoir semé la mort et la destruction.
languages.original_text: So was changed forevermore the life of the monastery of the Order of the Hammer and its brethren. Having waged a great battle and plundered mercilessly, the Rogue Trader claimed {mf|his|her} wicked harvest and departed Foulstone, with nary a backward look.

traits.locale_text: Ainsi sont à jamais transformés le monastère de l'Ordre du Marteau et ses disciples. Sans un regard en arrière, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} quitte Rochepeste après y avoir semé la mort et la destruction.

languages.text: Böylece Çekiç Tarikatı manastırının ve oradaki yoldaşların yaşamı sonsuza kadar değişmiş oldu. Büyük bir muharebe başlatıp merhametsizce yağmalar gerçekleştiren Hür Tacir, ganimetlerini topladı ve arkasına bile bakmadan Menfurtaş'tan ayrıldı.
languages.original_text: So was changed forevermore the life of the monastery of the Order of the Hammer and its brethren. Having waged a great battle and plundered mercilessly, the Rogue Trader claimed {mf|his|her} wicked harvest and departed Foulstone, with nary a backward look.

traits.locale_text: Böylece Çekiç Tarikatı manastırının ve oradaki yoldaşların yaşamı sonsuza kadar değişmiş oldu. Büyük bir muharebe başlatıp merhametsizce yağmalar gerçekleştiren Hür Tacir, ganimetlerini topladı ve arkasına bile bakmadan Menfurtaş'tan ayrıldı.
